summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingAnua Heartleaf 77 Clear Pad, toner pads to exfoliate, is infused with PHA to delicately exfoliate dead skin cells and reduce excess sebum.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll-in-one daily exfoliating toner pad that cleanses residue and removes dead skin cellsFragrance-freeFree Of: Alcohol / Parabens / Artificial Color / Silicones / Sulfates Mineral Oil / Methylchloroisothiazolinone / Methylisothiazolinone / NutsKey IngredientsPHA: Helps delicately exfoliate dead skin cellsAnti-sebum P: For helping to reduce sebum and minimize the appearance of pores, with 4 plant derived extractsHEARTLEAF+: Soothes sensitive skin irritations caused by dryness and helps maintain the skin's moistureResearch ResultsSkin irritation test completedNon-comedogenic test completedSebum secretion control evaluation (26.43% improvement after 2 weeks, 44.74% improvement after 4 weeks)87.36% improvement in skin hydration after 4 weeks of use27.27% improvement in pore volume value after 1 week of useItem 2634909How To UseWipe with the embossed side to exfoliate and remove dead skin cells.Gently pat to ensure enough absorption.Can be used every day, AM & PM.IngredientsHouttuynia Cordata Flower/Leaf/Stem Water, Water, Gluconolactone, Propanediol, Tromethamine, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Phytate, Betaine, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Pueraria Lobata Root Extract, Pinus Palustris Leaf Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Coix Lacryma-Jobi Ma-yuen Seed Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Madecassoside, Asiaticoside, Asiatic Acid, Madecassic Acid.
how_to_use: Wipe with the embossed side to exfoliate and remove dead skin cells.Gently pat to ensure enough absorption.Can be used every day, AM & PM.

reviews.headline: It was ok
reviews.comments: I bought it cause it had really good reveiws but I didnt see much of a difference my skin was still midly red where my acne is, i would try a diff product. Also it only lasted me a month

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: Definitely exfoliates! One of my favorite skincare products, just dont use on eyelids because it will make your eyelids swell up (beginners mistake)

reviews.headline: Where Have You Been All My Life
reviews.comments: I am blown away by ANUA skincare. My skin has never felt so clean and glowing. I plan to try all of their products.

reviews.headline: Gentle and doesn't burn
reviews.comments: I read the reviews and of course had mixed feelings on if I should try or not.  Well, I'm so glad I tried it!  MY experiences with wiping pads are always very drying to my skin and burns after using.  These are the opposite.  It was gentle and cleaned my face well.  I actually tried the deep pore cleanser, and I liked that as well.  I will now try the rest of the products.

reviews.headline: BEST PRODUCT EVER
reviews.comments: I have been so insecure about my oily skin and have struggled for years trying products to help it but this is the best product ever. I LOVE IT. my skin has been staying perfect all day and my makeup goes on amazing after using this product

reviews.headline: changed my skin for the better!!
reviews.comments: i'm obsessed with these toner pads! it's not a huge difference since i've only been using them one week but the difference it made with my breakouts/texture is noticable for sure!

reviews.headline: love love loveeee
reviews.comments: so i actually never leave reviews on products, mostly because i'm too lazy and nothing is ever THAT good for me to comment on. but omg when i tell you, these clear pads completely changed the texture of my skin. i struggled with flaky skin on my forehead, nose, and bumpy texture on my chin. after using these twice a day for about a week, not only did the texture basically disappear, but it helped clear up some pimples that kept repeatedly showing up in the same areas the past few weeks. this product also makes my makeup application so much smoother!!

reviews.headline: very worth it
reviews.comments: ive never tried a pad style toner like this but I'll probably never go back from these, its been a week and i have already noticed improvements not only in texture but tone and pores as well. They arent too harsh either, i find them very gentle. No smell either.

reviews.headline: New Favorite Toner
reviews.comments: I have combination, sensitive skin that I feel can be noticeably red. I've tried so many different toners and find that most have been so stripping or ineffective on my skin type. Having had success with other Korean skincare brands for serums and moisturizers, I decided to pick up ANUA's toning pads for another try at toners. I love the packaging, the tweezers have a dedicated spot so you can grab a pad without dirtying the lot or resting the tweezers on the product. I really appreciate that there are 70 pads in here so I feel less wasteful using them morning and night without having to repurchase frequently. I think I noticed a difference in my skin after a week of using so I'm also happy that this is effective in addition to just being a nice product.

reviews.headline: This is so refreshing and cool
reviews.comments: This is my first ever product from Anua and I'm very impressed! Mine did come with a little brown mark on the box but at least the product isn't damaged. Very easy to open, but don't leave the lid open or it will dry out!!

reviews.headline: Dry Yet Acne Prone Savior!
reviews.comments: I have struggled with acne since puberty. It seems to get worse the older i get. I have adult cystic acne, but its very hard to treat because my skin is SO dry. This product is a miracle worker! It cleanses, exfoliates, and tones WITHOUT drying me out! My subaceous fillaments are more subtle, and my redness is reduced. My skin has cleared beautifully, and FAST. I had minimal purging. I have very sensitive skin and no reaction. (I also have lupus if that helps anyone decide to purchase.)

reviews.headline: Incredible
reviews.comments: I am no longer as oily througout the day without feeling too dry. Has also incredibly improved my skin texure! I used to have closed comedones and this really helped gently exfoliate.

reviews.headline: Product review
reviews.comments: I have sensitive skin i absolutely dont recommend this product it made me breakout in the chin and forehead i rately get acne this made me purge ðŸ˜­

reviews.headline: Love this gentle exfoliation
reviews.comments: Being a skincare lover and licensed Esthetician, I really enjoyed using Anua's Heartless 77 Clear Pad, because it is so gentle and so easy to use while also being effective at removing dead skin cells and any leftover makeup and dirt residue. I have been using these pads for a month or so and I can say that I see and feel a huge difference in my skin! It tightens my pores without it feeling dry, it leaves my skin ready to absorb my serums, creams and sunscreen. It is a fragrance free product and so gentle for an exfoliating product, which makes it great for all skin types! This product is great because it uses natural, yet effective ingredients loved the fact that it came with small tweezers to pick up the pads without contamination to the other pads that sit in the jar!

reviews.headline: ANUA Heartleaf 77 Clear Pad: Living Up to the Hype!
reviews.comments:
I've been hearing so much buzz about ANUA, and the Heartleaf 77 Clear Pad was the first product I've had the pleasure of trying and it did not disappoint!

First off, the packaging is brilliant. The built-in tweezers are a game-changer for sanitary product dispensing. No more dipping my fingers into the jar! This small detail shows the brand's commitment to hygiene, which I really appreciate.

As for the pads themselves, they're fantastic. The heartleaf extract is incredibly soothing and calming. I love the gentle exfoliation the pads provide. It's not harsh or irritating, but just enough to slough away dead skin cells and leave my skin feeling smoother and brighter.

Using these pads has become a relaxing part of my skincare routine. My skin feels refreshed, hydrated, and noticeably clearer. I've noticed a reduction in redness and irritation, and my pores seem less visible.

If you're looking for a gentle exfoliating toner pad that's both effective and soothing, the ANUA Heartleaf 77 Clear Pad is definitely worth trying. It's living up to all the hype, and I can't wait to explore more of ANUA's products!

reviews.headline: Mid
reviews.comments: Very moist pad. Leaves behind a sticky residue behind im not a fan of.

reviews.headline: Great exfoliating pads
reviews.comments: I was using a different K beauty PHA toner pad, but having these available at Ulta is much more convenient than having to order from overseas.  These pads are as effective without any irritation.  The tweezers are a bonus!

reviews.headline: Love love love
reviews.comments: Leaves skin feeling refreshed and firmer

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Im using this product since two weeks and I only have to say that its amazing. It got Pha which exfoliates your face and neck, give them a nice and radiant looking glow and control the oil from your face. This product not only exfoliates your skin but also you a glowey and brighter look. It brightens your complexion out and make you look radiant and beautiful. Also it hydrates your face and not like any other exfoliating product, it strips everything out of you and make your skin dry like a desert. Also it clears out the complexion and make your pores looks smaller than before. Like I have seen on my face, that the bigger pores were more invisible and the other pores were gone. Moreover the packaging was convenient as well as easy to carry around while traveling.

reviews.headline: Great product when it comes to enlarged pores
reviews.comments: When using this product, you can instantly feel the tightening once it dries and pores become noticeably smaller. Definitely a great toner. As far as a francrance, it doesn't really have a smell. Does not leave a greasy feel afterwards. My face feels clean and up to par when I use this product. It's like a facelift in a jar. I would recommend to anyone who is curious about trying this product.

faceoff_positive.comments:
After using the ANUA Heartleaf 77 Toner Pads every night for a week, I'm genuinely impressed by how they've transformed my skin. These pads balance soothing hydration and gentle exfoliation, making them a delightfully easy addition to my routine.
What sets these apart is their versatility. The 70 generously soaked pads are perfect for my face, neck, and even elbows, leaving my skin feeling smoother and cared for. It's a little extra pampering that makes a big difference.
From the very first use, I could feel the gentle exfoliation working to lift away dead skin cells without a hint of irritation. After seven days, my skin is noticeably softer, with rough patches smoothed out and my complexion looking more refined. Even my T-zone, which often feels oily, has improvedâ€”fewer blackheads, tighter pores, and an overall fresher feel.
The star ingredient, 77% Heartleaf Extract, has been a breakthrough for my sensitive skin. It calms redness and irritation while delivering lightweight hydration that never feels greasy or heavy. The alcohol-free formula relieves anyone who worries about drying or stripping their skin.
But these pads don't stop at exfoliation and hydrationâ€”they also provide antioxidant and anti-inflammatory benefits that support long-term skin health. Knowing that every swipe contributes to a calmer, healthier complexion makes them feel like a luxurious yet practical choice.
If you're looking for an all-in-one skincare product that gently exfoliates, hydrates, and balances your skin, the ANUA Heartleaf 77 Toner Pads are worth trying. In just one week, I've seen my skin transform, and I'm excited to see if continued use will help me achieve that coveted glass-skin glow.
 
***This review was collected as part of a promotion ***
faceoff_positive.headline: The secret to Hydrated, Glass-Like Skin

faceoff_negative.comments: The ANUA Heartleaf Toner pad was a great way for me to include a toner into my routine without the fuss. The target of this Toner + Pad duo was to combine the benefits of both a hydrating Toner & Exfoliation by effectively trying to make possible that more reactive skin types get the benefits of exfoliation. The key ingredients of PHAs(PolyHydroxy Acids), Heartleaf, and Madecassoside aimed to give a gentle but effective exfoliating experience. The pads themselves don't carry a lot of product; but if you tip the container upside down then they'll be an even distribution of product on the most immediate pads. I used this every two days, because while the molecular weight of the exfoliating agents are larger than say your more known BHAs & AHAs. You can still overdo it especially with the added element of the physical property of the pad itself if you don't rub gently enough. The product on application leaves a tacky feel that I disliked, even so it doesn't interfere with follow up skin care steps. I'm using this my skin did get a reduction of redness from a new pimple. It immediately soothed the inflammation around my pimple and the texture (from old pitted scars/pores) was still there but slightly less obvious. I've been using this on my cheeks/neck/hands for the last week. In doing so I did notice I got Closed Comedones on my chin + cheeks. So I would say if you're prone to that test this out as there are fatty alcohols in here.
faceoff_negative.headline: A Simplification of a Usually Messy Skincare Step
